mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Student (studentNumber, department, grade, studentName, id, password, firstResidentId, lastResidentId) VALUES (#{studentNumber},#{department},#{grade},#{studentName},#{studentNumber},#{lastResidentId},#{firstResidentId},#{lastResidentId});
mapper.select: SELECT studentNumber, department, grade, studentName, id, password, firstResidentId, lastResidentId FROM Student WHERE id = #{studentId}
